item.text: For a teacher to be "agile" we mean that they borrow certain ideas and practices from [[Agile Methodology]] in their teaching.
[[Agile Teaching]] is the term we use to capture that methodology.

story.text: For a teacher to be "agile" we mean that they borrow certain ideas and practices from [[Agile Methodology]] in their teaching.
